Title: textile
Description: Narrow sleeve from a garment, woven in undyed silk; decorated with a band woven in undyed and purple silk, bearing geometric motifs in brocade, applied and sewn on the ground fabric. Tiraz fragment woven in beige silk; decorated with two bands of stylised vegetal interlacing and geometric motifs in blue silk. Ground fabric: Warp: silk, undyed, S, 24/cm Weft: silk, undyed, S, 18/cm Band: Warp: silk, undyed, Z, 24/cm Weft: silk, undyed and purple, Z, 24-56/cm
